ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] News on Alakhazam
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh. Yeah. I saw DAOC in the store the other day. It looked pretty interesting. Too bad I can t afford to play EQ and DAOC. But I ll stick with EQ since I
ygData.messageBody:
Heh. Yeah. I saw DAOC in the store the other day. It looked pretty
interesting. Too bad I can't afford to play EQ and DAOC. But I'll stick with
EQ since I already own it. Wouldn't want to get DAOC and find I didn't like
it.
luv,
-Su
ps. I got Conwyn to 42!

> hahhahaa
>
> DAOC and EQ merge, not a chance ROFLMAO oh that is rich hahahahahhaaha.
> I'm betting it's a gag April fools day joke on us =)
>
> Funny as heck though!
>
> Paria 36 Necro of the Tribunal
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: mlockridge01 [mailto:MLockridge01@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 02, 2002 12:06 PM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] News on Alakhazam
>
>
> I just read the news for April 1 on Alakhazam. Thought there would be
> some discussion on that here. None. Is everyone waiting to see if it
> is an April Fools day joke? I am hoping it is. If you haven't read it
> yet, pop over to Al and have a look.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
